summary: Provides typed data structures for Amazon Bedrock services, including request and response models for the Stability 3 text‑to‑image diffusion model and utilities for handling streaming server‑sent events and content block delta updates in conversational APIs.
business_intent: Offer a type‑safe, reusable interface for building Bedrock API payloads and interpreting their responses, enabling seamless integration of image generation and real‑time streaming chat features within the litellm ecosystem.
